---
title: "weighted Nearest Sequenced Taxon Index (wNSTI)"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(taxPPro)
library(castor)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Import tree

```{r}
ltp <- ltp()
tree <- ltp$tree
```

## Create two sets of known tip labels

```{r}
known_x <- sample(tree$tip.label, 10)
known_y <- sample(tree$tip.label, 2000)
```

## Get NSTI values

```{r}
nsti_x <- getNsti(tree = tree, annotated_tip_labels = known_x)
nsti_y <- getNsti(tree = tree, annotated_tip_labels = known_y)
```

## Plot a couple of histograms

```{r}
nsti_x |> 
    ggplot(aes(nsti)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1, fill = 'gray70', color = 'black') +
    theme_bw()
```

```{r}
nsti_y |> 
    ggplot(aes(nsti)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1, fill = 'gray70', color = 'black') +
    theme_bw()
```
